metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Wall and near HAG SurvivorsAfter Foundry destroyed, SW is abandoned, only kids came to look at it.Kid Please rename to Doober. interested in the SW
metadata.how_to_trigger: larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=CTY_Main_A&camPos=-47.817879;26.905397;-110.095284&camTarget=-47.641701;26.354410;-109.279579ReCon `SetGlobalOsirisFlag GLO_Foundry_State_ControlCentreDestroyed`Wait for kids to appear and run to SW

0.speaker: Doober
0.text: I wouldn't touch that thing if you double-drow-dared me!

1.speaker: Doober
1.text: The Watcher is super scary but still kind of cool. I bet I couldn't even lift that big sword.
